title: Blended MOOC Design and Evaluation for Data Science in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and medical data analysis terminology
context.additional_context: Optimizing smartphone-based learning environments, conducting weekly offline mentoring sessions

learning_goals: Learners can generate actual dataset analysis results by applying medical data preprocessing and visualization techniques
Learners can implement Python-based foundational machine learning models on medical datasets
Learners can explain ethical issues and privacy protection measures in medical data science fields

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
